attributes.action: Make all foreign car holders pay our road tax duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I live in a road which is next to a tube station and we have a people carrier parked here every day, obviously going to work, and he has no english car tax, i have told DVLA and the mayors office but noone seems interested, it is a blatant flouting of our laws. There should be a check kept on them as they come into the country so as they have to pay for road tax, speeding tickets and insurance and MOT's.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
